==== Notes ====

This laptop works under Feisty with considerable manual compiling.

Kernel:  2.6.20-16-generic SMP (Dual-core works)

glxinfo | grep rendering returns "No", but acceleration works. Xgl/Beryl works.

Screen brightness keys do not work in X, works in the terminal.
